Bash(source .venv/bin/activate && python3 -c "
import chess, requests

# Build the Ruy Lopez position move by move \(what python-chess thinks the FEN is\)
board = chess.Board\(\)
for mv in ['e2e4','e7e5','g1f3','b8c6','f1b5']:
    board.push\(chess.Move.from_uci\(mv\)\)
actual_fen = board.fen\(\)
print\('python-chess FEN:', actual_fen\)

url = 'https://explorer.lichess.ovh/masters'

# Query with the derived FEN
resp = requests.get\(url, params={'fen': actual_fen}, timeout=10\)
d = resp.json\(\)
print\('fen= total:', d.get\('white',0\)+d.get\('draws',0\)+d.get\('black',0\)\)
print\('moves:', [m['uci'] for m in d.get\('moves',[]\)[:5]]\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(source .venv/bin/activate && mysecond \\
    --fen "rnbqkbnr/pppp1ppp/8/4p3/4P3/5N2/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKB1R b KQkq - 1 2" \\
    --side white \\
    --player GothamChess \\
    --opponent im_eric_rosen \\
    --plies 20 \\
    --beam 6 \\
    --min-book-games 5 \\
    --novelty-threshold 2 \\
    --opponent-responses 3 \\
    --depths 20,24 \\
    --time-ms 200 \\
    --min-eval 0 \\
    --continuations 8 \\
    --workers 4 \\
    --max-positions 500 \\
    --max-candidates 50 \\
    --min-player-games 3 \\
    --min-opponent-games 3 \\
    --player-speeds "bullet,blitz,rapid,classical" \\
    --opponent-speeds "bullet,blitz,rapid,classical" \\
    --out "ideas_GothamChess_vs_im_eric_rosen.pgn" 2>&1)
Bash(curl -s "https://lichess.org/api/user/im_eric_rosen" | python3 -c "import json,sys; d=json.load\(sys.stdin\); print\(d.get\('id'\), d.get\('username'\)\)" 2>&1)
